Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Cancer Evolution Working Group. The 2022 CEWG Town Hall will feature five brief presentations on the theme of “Mapping the Landscape of Cancer Evolution/Perspectives of the Field Across the Cancer Spectrum” followed by a provocative Q&A session. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session. Complimentary refreshments will be served.
Location: Jefferson Ballroom, Hilton New Orleans Riverside
SearchResultBody: TM01. Cancer Evolution Working Group (CEWG) Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
